mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BOOMMASTER_TB ( boommaster_id, boommaster_user_id, boommaster_inDate, boommaster_outDate, boommaster_cardImgS, boommaster_cardImgO, boommaster_careerImgS, boommaster_careerImgO, boommaster_sampleVideoS, boommaster_sampleVideoO, boommaster_intro, boommaster_major1, boommaster_major2, boommaster_m
) VALUES ( boommaster_seq.nextval, #{boommaster_user_id}, #{boommaster_inDate}, #{boommaster_outDate}, #{boommaster_cardImgS}, #{boommaster_cardImgO}, #{boommaster_careerImgS}, #{boommaster_careerImgO}, #{boommaster_sampleVideoS}, #{boommaster_sampleVideoO}, #{boommaster_intro}, #{boommaster_major1}, #{boommaster_major2})
